description: a(n) = v(x[n]) where (x[k], k >= 0) is the earliest possible sequence of distinct nonnegative integer sequences such that |x[k+1] - x[k]| = 1 for all k, sequences being ordered by increasing m(x) := max(deg(x), sup(x)), then v(x) := Sum_{k >= 0} x(k)*b^k + [b > 10]*b^(b-1) with b = max(m(x)+1, 10).
